enb_long_title: Ninth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Following morning informal consultations, Parties considered a revised Co-Chairs` draft decision in the afternoon.

Addressing the initial operative paragraphs of the text, delegates deliberated how to address views on insurance, with the G-77/CHINA preferring to discuss 'possible elements of a work programme on insurance,' and the US preferring to discuss insurance and risk assessment.
Parties also debated the nature of a document containing submissions on activities in support of the provisions of decision 5/CP.7.
Discussions continued informally throughout the day.
